inst.name: Listen4ISORequest1
inst.short-description: Component to send messages to a socket and receive messages from a socket
inst.long-description: Socket Adapter is used for one-way Client and Server setup where a Client connects, sends messages to server and the server shows them using socket connection.

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT
inputport-instance.description: Content on Input port is written to Socket

outputport-instance.name: STATUS_PORT
outputport-instance.description: Sends confirmation that the message is written successfully

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT
outputport-instance.description: Content on Socket is written to Output port

outputport-instance.name: ON_EXCEPTION
outputport-instance.description: Used as an Exception Port

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT_1
inputport-instance.description: Default event port added by Business Component Creation Wizard.

outputport-instance.name: ON_EXCEPTION
outputport-instance.description: Used as an Exception Port

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT_1
outputport-instance.description: Default event port added by Business Component Creation Wizard.

inst.name: lookup
inst.short-description: The DBAdapter is a Query Engine that creates and executes a single SQL Statement or a set of queries to perform the database related operations such as insertion, updation, deletion, stored procedure execution or table monitoring
inst.long-description: The DBAdapter is a Query Engine that creates and executes a single SQL Statement or a set of queries to perform the database related operations such as insertion, updation, deletion, stored procedure execution or table monitoring

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT
inputport-instance.description: Accepts data related to queries in XSD format

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT
outputport-instance.description: Sends out results of the execution of SQL statements on the database

outputport-instance.name: ON_EXCEPTION
outputport-instance.description: Used as an Exception Port

inst.name: Inquiry
inst.short-description: This component invokes a web service (usually externally hosted on a third-party system) based on the configured WSDL
inst.long-description: This component invokes a web service (usually externally hosted on a third-party system) based on the configured WSDL

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT
inputport-instance.description: Takes input xml required by WS

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT
outputport-instance.description: Gives the output of WS in XML format

outputport-instance.name: ON_EXCEPTION
outputport-instance.description: Used as an Exception Port

inst.name: OFSConverter2
inst.short-description: OFSConverter component transforms data from XML format to Open Financial Service (OFS) message format and vice-versa.
inst.long-description: OFSConverter component transforms data from XML format to Open Financial Service (OFS) message format and vice-versa.

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT
inputport-instance.description: Takes input xml/ofs message and transforms into ofs message/xml respectively.

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT
outputport-instance.description: Gives the output of ofs message transformation.

outputport-instance.name: ON_EXCEPTION
outputport-instance.description: Used as an Exception Port

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT_1
inputport-instance.description: Default event port added by Business Component Creation Wizard.

outputport-instance.name: ON_EXCEPTION
outputport-instance.description: Used as an Exception Port

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT_1
outputport-instance.description: Default event port added by Business Component Creation Wizard.

inst.name: RaiseAlert
inst.short-description: Sends mail using SMTP mail server
inst.long-description: Sends mail using SMTP mail server

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT
inputport-instance.description: Default Input Port which accepts incoming messages of XML format

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT
outputport-instance.description: Sends confirmation that the e-mail has been delivered to the intended recipient(s)

outputport-instance.name: ON_EXCEPTION
outputport-instance.description: Used as an Exception Port
